message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $12,000. Could you meet me at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
